parameters.name: BasePath
parameters.description: The root path of the API.

parameters.name: CompatibleFlags
parameters.description: The list of associated tags. Separate multiple tags with commas (,).

parameters.name: CustomerConfigs
parameters.description: The data of custom configuration items.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The API group description that you want to specify, which cannot exceed 180 characters. If this parameter is not specified, the group description is not modified.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The API group name must be globally unique. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length. It must start with a letter and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). If this parameter is not specified, the group name is not modified.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The object tags that match the lifecycle rule. You can specify multiple tags.
